item.title: Puppet Module for FoundationDB
item.author: Author
item.description: FoundationDB has been purchased by Apple, and is no longer a product. Apple will be cancelling all support contracts and apprently not continuing to offer FDB for sale. Therefore this module is of course deprecated and no longer supported (at least by me!). Here at Bede we’ve been using FoundationDB for some time, and are basically in love with it. Fully distributed, ACID compliant transactions? Yes please. It’s fast, it scales, it’s reliable and redundant.
